SELECT sfi.FUND_ID, sfi.SHORT_NAME, smc.SHORT_NAME MGR_COMPANY, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wp_c c where c.FUND_ID = sfi.FUND_ID AND c.PERIOD = '${PERIOD}') CFLAG, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wp_e e where e.FUND_ID = sfi.FUND_ID AND e.PERIOD = '${PERIOD}') EFLAG, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wp_g g where g.FUND_ID = sfi.FUND_ID AND g.PERIOD = '${PERIOD}') GFLAG, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wp_h h where h.FUND_ID = sfi.FUND_ID AND h.PERIOD = '${PERIOD}') HFLAG, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wp_n n where n.FUND_ID = sfi.FUND_ID AND n.PERIOD = '${PERIOD}') NFLAG, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wp_p p where p.FUND_ID = sfi.FUND_ID AND p.PERIOD = '${PERIOD}') PFLAG, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wp_t t where t.FUND_ID = sfi.FUND_ID AND t.PERIOD = '${PERIOD}') TFLAG, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wp_u u where u.FUND_ID = sfi.FUND_ID AND u.PERIOD = '${PERIOD}') UFLAG, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wp_v300 v where v.FUND_ID = sfi.FUND_ID AND v.PERIOD = '${PERIOD}') VFLAG, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wp_i_rp i where i.FUND_ID = sfi.FUND_ID AND i.PERIOD = '${PERIOD}') IFLAG FROM sys_fund_info sfi LEFT JOIN sys_mgrcompany smc ON sfi.FIRM_CODE = smc.COMPANY_CODE WHERE 1 = 1 and sfi.FIRM_CODE = #{FIRM_CODE}
